title: Fps drop after 5-7 mins game
body:
Hi i have problem with fps drop after playing 5-7 mins. At the start of the game everything is all right then after 5-7 mins fps dropped to 50.
Can somebody help me with this?

replies.body:
50fps isn't too terribly bad tbh, but it sounds like it should be higher based on how you mentioned it drops during the game. Without knowing too much more about what's going on, it could be any number of different issues happening, but let's start with some basics. 

Try turning on "close client during game" really quickly, but also try turning off any background programs as well. A clean boot can help you minimize how many programs are running in the background so that could help out. Let me know if this helps or not, we may need to go on through the steps in the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) too.
You know- if you wanna any help from anyone, then I think, that GREAT thing from you would be something like your PC specification, ya know? :S
